name: liquid-ai-vision-kit
description: Liquid Neural Networks for embedded vision systems

scripts.lint: npm run lint:markdown && npm run lint:cpp
scripts.format: npm run format:cpp && npm run format:markdown
scripts.format:cpp: clang-format -i src/**/*.cpp src/**/*.hpp include/**/*.hpp tests/**/*.cpp tests/**/*.hpp
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.build:debug: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.build:release: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.build:embedded: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DTARGET_PLATFORM=ARM_CORTEX_M7 .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.dev: npm run build:debug && npm run test
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run security-check
